channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Racing
channel.desc: Francesca Cumani and Ed Chamberlin present coverage of racing from Newmarket, York and Chepstow - the feature meeting is at Newmarket and includes the Group One Fillies' Mile.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Ronnie from Dumfriesshire, Mick from Harrogate, Charlie from Maidenhead and Bill from Fife face a big challenge - one of the UK's most cunning Chasers.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Nicola is devastated by the arrival of the police, Dawn is aghast at the situation, and Belle and Kammy may have acted in haste.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Kevin tells Abi that she is no longer welcome at Number 13, Brian accuses Trisha of taking advantage of Tim, and Todd turns to Billy for support rather than Theo.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Borderline
channel.desc: The concluding part of the first case in the police drama series. Detectives Boyd and Regan continue their investigation into how the body came to Northern Ireland.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Judi Love's Culinary Cruise
channel.desc: Judi's stop this time is the olive oil land of Parga as she tries traditional Greek coffee, learns everything to do with olive oil, and visits a hotel's historic gardens.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Simply Raymond Blanc
channel.desc: Raymond cooks a delicious Swiss chard gratin and shares a truly special dish - duck breast with marmalade, Vichy-style carrots, and sweet potato.

channel.title: You Bet! on Tour
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern is joined by Alex Brooker, AJ Odudu, and Ryan and Adam Thomas as he travels across the UK to find more ordinary people taking on some extraordinary challenges.

channel.title: Minions
